column1: I watch this movie and it was amazing.
I want to kill myself after watch this movie.
This show made me feel good about my goals.
I suggest the crew can perform better.
This movie made me realize how bad a movie can be.
There was an amazing hooting in the movie theater.
Our baby started crying due to loud unpleasing movie sound
There was good amount of research done by story writer before producing this movie.
There was an outbreak of riots by people in our city.
